Tweet: Arjuna said: O Keśava, I wish to know this knowledge and the knower of the field, the knower of the field, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
The Supreme Personality of Godhead, O son of Kunti, is called the field of the Supreme Personality of Godhead. He who knows this is said to be the knower of the field.
O descendant of Bharata, know Me as the knower of the field and the knowledge of the fields and the fields.  ॥
Now please hear from me in brief that the field is the source of all that is in the form of whatever it is, and whatever it is. .
The Ṛṣis sang in various ways, and separately from various Vedic mantras, and by the Vedic mantras, the Vedas and the Vedic mantras were determined.  ॥
The great living beings are the ego, the intellect, the unmanifest, the ten senses, the five senses, and the five senses are perceivable by the senses.
Desire, hatred, happiness, pain, aggregation, consciousness, patience, this field are described in brief in brief.
Unmanifest, arrogance, non-violence, forbearance, simplicity, worship of the ācārya, purity, steadfastness and self-control.
The senses of sense gratification are the sources of detachment, egoism, birth, death, old age, disease, pain and evils.
Attachment to his sons, wives, houses, etc.
By the practice of exclusive devotion to Me is undisturbed by me and in the assembly of men who served them in a secluded place
The eternity of spiritual knowledge is the vision of the meaning of knowledge of the truth and this knowledge is said to be ignorance

I shall now explain to you the knowledge that I shall explain to you, knowing the nectar of the Supreme Personality of Godhead, the eternal Supreme Absolute Truth, the Supreme Absolute Truth, and the Supreme Absolute Truth.  ॥
His hands, feet, eyes, heads, faces and faces were covered with all kinds of scents, and he was covered with all kinds of scents.  ॥
It is the reflection of all the senses and is devoid of all the senses and is not attached to the body and is devoid of the modes of nature  ॥
Because of its subtlety the moving and non-moving beings are moving and unmoving and that which is not known or near or near  ॥
It is undivided and separated from all living entities as if they were separated from all living beings. .
The light of all the lights is called the supreme light, and the knowledge of all knowledge is perceivable in the heart.  ॥
I have thus understood the field, knowledge, and knowable in detail. .
Know that both nature, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, the various elements, the modes of nature and the modes of nature, the origin and the modes of nature.  ॥
The cause of the cause and effect is called nature. The Supreme Personality of Godhead is the cause of the enjoyer of pleasures and pains.  ॥
A person who is situated in the material world enjoys the modes of material nature and enjoys the modes of material nature.  ॥
The Supreme Personality of Godhead is the Supreme Personality of Godhead, who is the Supreme Personality of Godhead, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, who is the Supreme Personality of Godhead.  ॥
Anyone who thus knows the Supreme Personality of Godhead, along with His transcendental modes of nature, is never born again.  ॥
Some of them see themselves in the Self by meditation, while others see themselves in the Self by means of Sāṅkhya, yoga and yoga. .
Others, not knowing this, heard this from others, but they were devoted to the Vedas. .
O best of the Bhāratas, know that as long as there is any living entity, movable and immovable, is united with the knower of the field and the field.  ॥
He who sees the Supreme Personality of Godhead in all living entities is perishable and perishable and perishes in all living beings .
One who sees equality everywhere in the same position does not kill the Supreme Personality of Godhead and therefore attains the supreme destination .
He who sees himself in every way by nature sees himself in the same way as the doer of the universe. .
When one sees the separate nature of the living entity in one place, the expansion of the Absolute Truth is attained.  ॥
O son of Kunti, even though the Supreme Self is eternal and devoid of the modes of material nature, the Supreme Self is not tainted or tainted by the body.  ॥
Just as the sky is omnipresent in all its subtlety and the self is not tainted in the body, so the self is not tainted in the body. .
O descendant of Bharata, in the same way that the sun illuminates the entire world, the field and the field, the entire world is illuminated.  ॥

Those who know the difference between the senses and the fields of knowledge and the knowledge of the Supreme Personality of Godhead, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, who know the Supreme Personality of Godhead. .
